Name: Elven Tales - Rise of Darkness
About the game: The first Elven Tales story arc is called Rise of Darkness . Altogether there will be five chapters that will tell the first part of this fantastic adventure. This build will bring the first three chapters of the story arc. Through a visual novel, you will be introduced to a main character full of internal conflicts and discriminated by his appearance, Elves in a quest and an ancient god hungry for souls. Although some of your decisions can lead to failure or success, the main focus of the game is to provide a good fantasy story. We are working to release the other two chapters by February 2022. We're excited to release the first chapter of the second story arc - which will be called Between Gods and Angels - also in February 2022. Our sincere thanks to all of you who are helping us and believing in our work by purchasing our project. As a gift, you will have free access to the first chapter of the sequel - scheduled for release in February 2022. Join this different adventure!
